DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Asia. The aim of this study is to investigate the safety and efficacy of NovoLet® human insulin delivery system in an outpatient setting.
DOC.brief_title: NovoLet® Surveillance Study on Using Human Insulin System in Indonesia
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes mellitus Type 2 diabetes mellitus Other types of diabetes mellitus (gestational, drug induced [thiazide] or metabolic syndromerelated)
